description:
Since our law firm opened its doors in 1985, the people of Owings Mills, Maryland, have turned to us for representation for a wide variety of personal injury cases. Today, nearly 30 years later, the attorneys at Plaxen & Adler, P.A., still strive to deliver the high-quality representation for which our law firm is so rightfully known.

Unlike many personal injury firms, our firm's attorneys do not focus solely on motor vehicle accidents. We offer representation to all individuals whose suffering is the result of another party's negligence. In fact, we regularly represent clients in medical malpractice cases, premises and product liability cases, and even cases involving dog bites. In addition, we also assist those who are filing for workers' compensation or Social Security Disability benefits, and those who are appealing recent decisions.

If an accident left you seriously injured and unable to work, you can turn to Plaxen & Adler, P.A., for dependable personal injury representation. If you suffered unnecessarily at the hands of a medical professional, we can help you, too. Regardless of the source, you can count on receiving aggressive, yet compassionate, legal service from our law firm's attorneys.

If you would like to find out how we can help, you can schedule a free initial consultation at any one of our nine office locations. Our attorneys are available on weekends and evenings, and will gladly travel to your home or hospital if you are unable to come to us.
